title: Can someone please tell me who are the english casters for the LCK 2015? They are awesome!
body:
Hi! I just wanted to know who are the english casters commenting on the LCK matches this year. They are hilarious!! (I think one might be Kobe, because of the voice, but I'm not sure).

Watching the matches is extra fun because of them, and I know it must be tiresome to cover so many matches in one day (since in LCK the matches are best of 3). So I just wanted to shout out to them and say thanks for the hard work! You make my day. :)

Cheers from Brazil! (Sorry for any english mistakes)

replies.body: Christopher "MonteCristo" Mykles (@ggMonteCristo) and Erik "DoA" Lonnquist (@ggDoA). They have been casting OGN (now LCK) for a while.

Thanks so much! I only started following the LCK this year, so I didn't know it was them. Love their jokes. :)

BTW, I searched and found out that MonteCristo's twitter is actually @ggCMonteCristo, just fyi. :)

> [{quoted}](name=Rav3n89,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=9Yc0lEXQ,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-01-30T18:13:06.283+0000)

> 
> BTW, I searched and found out that MonteCristo's twitter is actually @ggCMonteCristo, just fyi. :)

DoA's Skin concepts!
Papasmithie sorry about spelling cast lck also.

yeah theyve been casting OGN forever now :p sometimes Chobra will come on when one of them is off.  Doa also casts other games(at least Hearthstone), and he sued to be a Starcraft caster for IPL before that stopped. Not sure about Monte's background entirely, i just remember DOA from watching IPL a lot lol.
Yeah, those two are the best. Good chemistry and they know the players well.
